content.rendered:
I know I whinge a lot…so here’s some things I like at the moment:

  • iBooks on my iPod Touch: it’s the slower of two book readers but I like it and I’m using it to read…
  • a free eBook that I got from SitePoint: all about…
  • jQuery: which, had I discovered a while back would have saved me a whole LOAD of time and effort.

So it’s not all bad!

excerpt.rendered: I know I whinge a lot…so here’s some things I like at the moment.
